detaileddescription.para: Monitoring the state of the ECUs
DoIP ECU Table for monitoring the state of the CAN/LIN ECUs
Save the CanIDs for the CAN ECUs
Save the ComChannels for a specific CanIDs

briefdescription.para: Public interface useful for debugging

detaileddescription.para: The variables, macros and typedef defined in this module are used for error statistics and for monitoring DoIP frames routing
